arts.sum: Highlights of the Sky Bet League One game between Shrewsbury Town and Wrexham.

arts.ttl: John Marquis brace helps struggling Shrewsbury upset high-flying Wrexham
arts.sum: Wrexham could have gone top of League One with a win.

arts.ttl: Welcome to Bogota? Wrexham duo invest again
arts.sum: Hollywood actors Ryan Reynolds, Rob McElhenney and Eva Longoria are among the investors in a North American group that has acquired Colombian top division side La Equidad.

arts.ttl: Alan Shearer casts doubt on Wrexham's Premier League aspirations under Ryan Reynolds
arts.sum: Wrexham have the chance to secure a third successive promotion under co-owners and Hollywood actors Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney, but Alan Shearer is unsure how far the club can go

arts.ttl: Alan Shearer explains why he's 'not sure' about Wrexham as Gary Lineker talks finances
arts.sum: Alan Shearer has given his verdict on whether Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney will achieve their lofty ambitions of Wrexham one day playing Premier League football

arts.ttl: 'I wowed James Maddison and won Harry Kane comparisons - Wrexham know I'm available'
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou has confirmed Will Lankshear could leave Tottenham on loan in January, with Hollywood-owned Wrexham previously linked with the young striker

arts.ttl: Wrexham trio a doubt for derby game at Shrewsbury Town
arts.sum: Lee has not played for Phil Parkinson's side since the 2-1 home win against Wigan on December 29, he came on as a substitute in that game in the 70th minute for Ollie Palmer. Barnett was a surprise exclusion for the Red Dragons in their last clash against Peterborough - a game they won 1-0 thanks to Steven Fletcher's late goal in the 87th minute.

Three of Shrewsbury's four wins this season have come at home - but they face a daunting task against a Wrexham side who have lost just twice in the last three-and-a-half months. The Shrews lost the ...

arts.ttl: Wrexham player to return in the summer amid latest loan development

arts.ttl: Wrexham star Mullin: My life has changed a lot in the last few years
arts.sum: Paul Mullin is undoubtedly a busier man than last time he was a League One player.
